pullrequest.title: Some collada files rotate the normals.

content.raw:
pull request #501 was an improper fix. It worked for the polaris, but didn't work for the soccer ball.

Originally we translated and rotated the normals. Pull request #501 turned this off (the polaris's transform had translation and no rotation), which fixed the polaris. The soccer ball has both translation and rotation. So, we added back in rotation of normals.
